thread.title: Great deal , great location - Review
thread.title_full: Great deal , great location - Review of Mercure Paris La Sorbonne Saint Germain des Pres, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: JoMarre
title: Great deal , great location - Review
text:
Perfect place for in the most Parisian neighborhood of the city. Clean , not too small rooms as usually you get in Paris, we got a great price as well so definitely good place to stay.
In front of La Sorbonne you have just steps a small square , Saint Mitchell Boulevard and plenty of cafes and restaurants.
The staff of the hotel was really helpful and everything was perfect. We have been there a couple of times before and we always go back.
